content.detailedDescription:
i live about 4 miles north of downtown south bend indiana and a mile and a half north of notre dame indiana. at 10:15 pm on july 13 2013 i was watching tv when i looked out of my living room window to the south and saw a red/orange object traveling from the east going to the west. it looked to be about twice the size of the brightest star.
	 i went out into my back yard and saw that there were two of them. i got my phone in video mode and filmed them until they went behind my neighbors trees. i saw that there were three more coming into view and i filmed them as well until they also went behind the trees. i switched my phone into hd mode and got another, much better video of one of the objects. when i zoomed into the last one you can see its colors changing rapidly. 
	they were all traveling at the same speed and in the same direction but not in a straight line. one was a little lover than the rest. i don���t know how fast they were moving but they came into view from around a tree to my due south and went out of my view behind my neighbors tree to the southwest of my house, in about a minuet to a minuet and a half.
	after the six objects all were out of view i stayed outside for another half hour to see if there were any more. there were not.
content.summary: I saw 6 red/orange objects fly from east to west. sighting lasted about 5 min.

content.detailedDescription: I was 15 in 1980, i was just home from school at 3pm and had the urge to go outside.  no one was around despite it being a beautiful spring day right after school. from out of the north a small saturn shaped shiny and dull orb came around the neighbors house and hovered over the edge of the roof 10 feet (3 meters) above me. lights then formed and started circling around the craft with this message pizza hut special 15.99.  i was frozen to the spot for about 3minutes and could not leave. suddenly it literally just disappeared and i felt released to be able to leave. this experience has stayed with me and was the beginning of my research and constant fascination with all things ufo since. i have never to my knowledge ha.Had another experience. years later i visited a psychic who told me my mind was not ready to receive the message at that time, but what it really said was " be patient, rick,the time is not yet"
content.summary: Ufo called me out house left me a message

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on our way home from fireworks in arvada at approximately 10:10 pm. we were heading south on kipling st and we caught sight of a bright blue/purple flashing in the sky to the left of us (west). i continued paying attention to the road and asked her to keep an eye on the lights. i pulled off into a parking lot on a hill and parked the car facing west. the cross made of lights on mount lindo was directly in front of us. we observed the light hovering just above the mountain ridge to the left of, and above the cross. the lights seemed to be coming from one object that flashed rapidly and in a color sequence. two small red lights on top and a blue light on the bottom, then the red lights would blink off, and the blue light would change to a blue-green almost teal color, then back to solid blue, and then the red lights would reappear. this pattern continued in a rapid flashing. my wife thought perhaps it was a police car on the mountain, however being familiar with the mountain i knew that the lights were too high to even be on it. we observed the flashing for several minutes. i was somewhat excited to be witnessing a second event in the same night. suddenly the bandimere speedway fireworks began at 10:30 and since the lights were still flashing and unmoving, we decided to stay and watch the show. mid-show i glanced up the mountaintop and noticed that the lights were gone. i was bummed that i had missed it. we finished the firework show and  i put the car in gear and pulled forward to u-turn, but hit my breaks mid-turn with my jaw on the floor. my wife gasped as she took noticed of what i observed. the lights were back, flashing in sequence in the exact same spot. i wanted to stay and observe more but my wife was tired and we agreed that after our sighting in arvada and now lakewood,we had filled our quota of unexplained events. we headed home dumbfounded and excited.
content.summary: Driving home from fireworks and noticed a bright flashing blue, green and red light hovered above the cross made of lights on the side of mount lindo

content.detailedDescription: Just before sunset, approx. 9:15pm on july 13th 2013. i was driving home from the local store/gas station on highway 34 in ky and saw 3 orange firery lights in the sky. they were rising and seemed to also be coming towards me. the lowest one was just above tree top level it also appeared to be the farthest away from me. i then noticed a 4th light appear from the horizon and closely followed the same path. i pulled my car off the road and noticed several other cars also stopped and pointing at the lights. a fifth light also appeared from just above the horizon. the speed of the lights rising, intermitently changed from slow (almost hovering) to quick short bursts. as the lights rose out of sight, they seemed to make u turns while rising. then 1 by 1 they disappeared as they rose up and away from me. i was in the air force for many years and have seen alot of planes, jets, and ballons but, i can honestly say that this was something i have never witnessed before.
content.summary: 5 lights rising

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i decided last minute to watch the fireworks at lutz field in arvada. we found a spot on a small hill and set up a blanket several blocks from, and west of the firework location. the show began normally and about 15 minutes in i glanced to the left of the easterly fireworks (ne) and caught sight of an orange orb hovering. my first thought was a helicopter, and i vocalized this to my wife. i offered that perhaps it was a chinese lantern, being independence day. she watched with me as a second identical orb blinked on to the right of the first and then split into two, creating a third orb. the third orb then split itself to make a fourth. all objects began "dancing" around one another slowly. their movement was very fluid and methodic as they descended and ascended around one another. suddenly one of them blinked off and the other three came together to form a deliberate triangle. they hovered unmoving for several seconds in that formation and then the fourth blinked back on and one at a time the objects made a hook turn and drifted to the northeast below tree line and out of our sight. we were both in awe during the entire event, our attention drawn fully away from the fireworks. there were other people around us who seemed to be too enthralled in the show to notice. if anyone else did they did not vocalize it. i believe my wife was a little frightened because she wanted to leave immediately after the last orb was no longer visible. i convinced her to stay and we finished the show. unfortunately the objects were too dim and small to capture on our cell phones. later that same night we observed another strange event on which i will file a separate report as the time and location is different.
content.summary: Multiple orbs seen at fireworks show. they "danced" around one another and blinked off and reappeared again for about five minutes.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i decided last minute to watch the fireworks at lutz field in arvada. we found a spot on a small hill and set up a blanket several blocks from, and west of the firework location. the show began normally and about 15 minutes in i glanced to the left of the easterly fireworks (ne) and caught sight of an orange orb hovering. my first thought was a helicopter, and i vocalized this to my wife. i offered that perhaps it was a chinese lantern, being independence day. she watched with me as a second identical orb blinked on to the right of the first and then split into two, creating a third orb. the third orb then split itself to make a fourth. all objects began "dancing" around one another slowly. their movement was very fluid and methodic as they descended and ascended around one another. suddenly one of them blinked off and the other three came together to form a deliberate triangle. they hovered unmoving for several seconds in that formation and then the fourth blinked back on and one at a time the objects made a hook turn and drifted to the northeast below tree line and out of our sight. we were both in awe during the entire event, our attention drawn fully away from the fireworks. there were other people around us who seemed to be too enthralled in the show to notice. if anyone else did they did not vocalize it. i believe my wife was a little frightened because she wanted to leave immediately after the last orb was no longer visible. i convinced her to stay and we finished the show. unfortunately the objects were too dim and small to capture on our cell phones. later that same night we observed another strange event on which i will file a separate report as the time and location is different.
content.summary: Multiple orbs seen at fireworks show. they "danced" around one another and blinked off and reappeared again for about five minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was out having a beer with my neighbor on his patio. we were looking at the stars and looking for plains and satelites in the skies. i noticed a plain flying from the west to the east close to the milky way. then i saw the 5 glowing lights! the 4lights were in a diamond shape and the 5th light was located just behind the 4th light at the nine oclock position. they were flying faster then the plain moving from the north to the south. i saw it for about 5 seconds and was not able to point the lights out to my neighbor. the lights were at a higher elevation then the plain. the lights moved over the home and i lost site of it.
content.summary: Saw 5 lights and 4 in a diamond shape and the fifth was on the left side from looking at the diamond from under neith

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were cooking out behind our house than suddenly it came out of nowhere.
2. we saw a ball of light with a long tail on it.
3. we noticed that it first appeared to be a comet until it stopped suddenly in the sky.
4. it appeared to stop in the sky and split up into 5 separate pod-like structures. the pods slowly moved away from the structure for what appeared to be five minutes than gently moved back towards the center structure.
5. i wondered if it was going to come and hit the ground within a 60 mile range of my house.
6. it disappeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: This object appeared to be a comet but stopped and split into smaller pieces.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home when i first noticed the object. it was a dim light in the sky and as i watched it, it started to glow brighter then dim out off and on. at first i thought it was a plane until it started brightnening and dimming. after a while it started slowly moving to the left afterhivering for about 30 minutes. so we jumped in the car and drove towards it and as we gotcloser to its general location we were able to get a better shot of it. we were shocked at what we saw. we lost sight from the obstructions such as buildings, trees, and a hill.
content.summary: Driving to half moon bay looking for the crafts. we taped them while driving

content.detailedDescription: I was at home when i first noticed the object. it was a dim light in the sky and as i watched it, it started to glow brighter then dim out off and on. at first i thought it was a plane until it started brightnening and dimming. after a while it started slowly moving to the left afterhivering for about 30 minutes. so we jumped in the car and drove towards it and as we gotcloser to its general location we were able to get a better shot of it. we were shocked at what we saw. we lost sight from the obstructions such as buildings, trees, and a hill.
content.summary: Driving to half moon bay looking for the crafts. we taped them while driving

content.detailedDescription: I see  a glowing red ball while i was driving, others pulled over to see i then seen another travelling in same direction i then realized i had a video camera and pulled over and filmed it. glowing ball of light that did not ascend in elevation like that of a fire lantern. caught the second one on film it came from over upper deck restaurant. i zoomed up and it distorted the image, a car goes by the object was treetop level. the time on my car clock is 6 minutes fast. i was hanging out my window hence the poor video.
content.summary: Saw a glowing red ball while i was driving, others pulled over to see i then seen another travelling in same direction i then realized i had a video camera and pulled over and filmed it. glowing ball of light that did not asend in elevation

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a bright white object hovering at low orbit in the sky across the road from my house.
content.summary: Similar shape to a well known picture of a ufo photographed in i think was belgium

content.detailedDescription: 1) i was driving down main and had just made a left onto spadina avenue. as i was pulling up to the first set of stop signs at the first intersection on spadina and dunsmure road, there was a car going to park in his/her driveway and another one coming through the intersection. the roads are relatively narrow so i pulled to the right and just waited for these vehicles to pass. to preoccupy myself i was just staring up into the night sky where the trees weren't blocking my view when all of a sudden this oval-ish circle shaped glowing orb - the colour was basically a pearl white - "flew" by towards the north east. it was moving as a considerably fast pace in a straight line and i'm 100% confident it wasn't a plane. i've been on the road many times and there is no reason a plane would be that low (or at least shine that brightly) and move that smoothly. not to mention it was essentially an orb. this was around 9:46pm. i managed to watch it for maybe 5 seconds before it got shrouded by the overseeing trees. i was astonished - i'm an avid 'fan' of the prospect of ufo sightings, the mystery behind them etc. and this was something any person who is interested in this stuff would die for, even if it was for a measly few seconds. the fact that there was another person that sighted this and reported it at relatively the same time gave me the motivation to come on here and report it as well.
content.summary: An oval/circle pearl coloured orb flying a straight smooth path with no stuttered flat at a constant fast pace

content.detailedDescription: It was amazing all three of us saw them- lights that broke off - red and white and they would go backwards, forwards,  appear disappear.Not connected fully in appearance spatially to regular time and space.They looked like jumbly areas of flashing red and white lights
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: I was at home walking to my pool equipment as i came around the side of my house and could see south i saw it coming from over the river and just over the top of one of the river front homes it looked like a  strange orange color ball coming at me and just east of me and my house. i saw  the same objects three week to the day just later in the night it shocked me that time at first then i ran to get a camera this time i just ran to get the camera. when i got returned to the back yard it was almost even with my house it was just east of me flying slow and not high 500 feet or less i would say they are about 25 to 305 feet across it may even be 40 feet across. the object had what looked like a cloud or mist of what i would have to say is energy around it and it moved like in waves or like it was jumping slow then a bit faster then it looked as if it slow down again then jump or move faster that is why i say it looked as if it moved in waves. i was able to take some pictures of it as it past me it made a slight bank or changed the flight path just a bit to the north east just as it past. i was looking at the pictures i just took on the cameras small monitor but i could only see a orange dot. i when back to my pool equipment i looked south again and here comes one more wow i could not believe it this object was just a bit more east on its flight path but was moving at the same speed this one did have as much of the cloud around it. but it was the same as object i just saw less then three minutes before.  i took some picture of it also as it past. i have not changed any thing at all with the photos. one of the photos # 002 there is so much in the picture if you don't zoom in to much you can see round red balls above and below the object you can see a square of orange yellow white light and at the front of the object it looks as if there is some thing hanging down from it and what my be windows in the front above the bright light. when i took the pictures it looked like it was a strange orange ball flying but it is so much more much you only see the out line of the ball it has a flat bottom and it is a little harder to make out but there is a dome shape top i saw none of this. the object at the back and at the center you can see one large circle and a cone in the center of the circle and a area shaped like a v that looks cooler the rest on the bottom of the object. there is also one other smaller circle just to the side of the the larger circle. at no time did ether object make a sound at all and the strange orange color ball thing is really to hide the craft. this is the third time and four objects right here the first was in march then three weeks to the day before 7-10-2013. each time the crafts are flying slow low and come out of the same location going the same way i think that there may be many more flying over the community i live in . the photos i took #002 is the best ufo picture i have ever seen not because i took them because the craft was so close you don't need to zoom much to see so much detail and by luck the date is right below the craft. in photos # 005 and 006 you can see what i many by the craft moved in waves. i can say i am nerves because i took some with the flash on and i could be located very easy if someone would want to fine the location the pictures were shot from. i am happy for web site like this so the story and the location with the pictures can get out for all can see. if this craft is u.S. wow i have only seen thing that fly in the sky with wings and motors and they make noise but this has none of what you would say is the normal at all. again i have not changed in any way the pictures.
content.summary: Orange sphere like with a mist or cloud around one of them

content.detailedDescription: Was mowing the lawn at in-laws home on a yard tractor, traveling south at the time of happening. i was paying extra attention as i was mowing the county road edge of the yard, watching for on coming traffic to pop up over a hill. i saw at about 300 yards away a transparent rotating object moving east to west at a very high rate of speed. about 1-2 feet off the ground maybe, close to 4 feet in diameter. the object had depth of a couple feet, was if you were looking through a crystal, resembled a bladed impellor rotating on edge. object was spining super fast in a circle vertically, (like a tire on a car). object was moving at 40 to 50 mph. object was running along the edge of the corn field, the green corn stalks enabled me to see the depth of the object, as if looking through plexiglas or a crystal. the corn stalks did not move, but the tops of the corn plants shook viloently. about 25 feet from reaching the county road, the spining object shot upward at about a 35 degree angle, and was not visable anymore. no noise above the riding tractor was noticed. i thought what the hell, wasn't going to tell anyone. decided to tell my wife. she could tell i wasn't lying about what i saw.
content.summary: Crystaline like whirling circle ran down the edge of the corn field at a high rate of spee, turned upward at 45 degrees and was not visable

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On july 6th at approximately 930pm, my mother and i were driving the car down the road and in the dark sky we saw about 10-14 rectangular very orange glowing beams that hovered in pairs.  we stopped in the road and just watched in shock.  we watched for about 4 minutes and the all disappeared as the seemed to be going more north.
content.summary: Orange lights in the sky ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was with my girlfriend sitting on the hood of her car looking at the stars. i was just looking around and i saw this star that was moving around randomly, so i pointed it out to my girlfriend. the star-like object appeared to be moving around in no particular direction, until it got to some grouping of stars where it looked like it was "vibrating" or moving up and down then it just stayed there. what made me question this was the fact that there is no aircraft that can move that freely, back and forth, so quickly and randomly. also, it was extremely too high up to be any kind of human aircraft. i decided it could not be any sort of uav because uavs are unable to move in different directions the way this did, also not a satellite for the same reason. i believe before i saw it i saw a shooting star as well, if it is significant at all. i was very calm when i saw it and tried to rule out every possibility and could not come up with anything. the object did not disappear either as far as i could tell i unfortunately had to leave however i am going back out tonight around the same time and look for it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It appeared to be a star and it was very random

content.detailedDescription:
My nephew (john) and i went outside (me first then he joined me) to watch the fire works for the 4th of july celebration.  i first observed and then told my nephew about a dark red object moving very slowly several miles west of us.  it was not a plane because of its speed and the object seemed to have a flickering effect like a candle would in a gentle breeze.  i watched this object for about 2 minutes before it vanished into the clouds or above them.

after a few minutes my nephew went back into our apartment because he was getting tired of the mosquitoes.  about 2 minutes later i observed another similar object south of me either in the clouds or above the cloud line.  the object was in a northeastern path and i observed this object for about 1 1/2 minutes before it vanished from site because of the clouds at the same time i was trying to capture it on video.  this was the last i seen of it.  the object appeared to be my fire emitting friend i have seen many times before.  all i could see was the flickering of what appeared to be was the flame.  because of the objects distance and altitude, my guess would be that both objects had to be large "ships."
content.summary: 2 ? flickering flames observed in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the living room around 10:00pm when i looked out the window
and saw what appeared to be an aircraft red in color moving very slowly, upon
closer inspection it did not have the normal characteristics of an airplane,
at said time me and my buddy ran out side to get a better look. once outside
we observed what appeared to be an ufo it appeared to be on fire in color,
moved very slow, with no sound at all, and at times appeared to hover and wobble 
slightly. i grabbed my phone out of my back pocket and filmed about 1 min of
video footage, the object moved in from the north and vanished in the sw 
once it got near the airport it vanished into thin air,
this was my first sighting and i was blown away, i see aircraft night and day 
and this was no aircraft.  i have video from a cell phone and ill try to upload
the phone stopped recording about a min into the event, i couldn't capture it vanishing
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Look like a ball of fire, close to airport, witnessed flight before vanishing

content.detailedDescription: While sitting in my kitchen @ 11:30 pm  i saw a bright light hovering over the half moon bay mountains for about 30 minutes just sitting there then as i wathced i noticed it was comming closer so i pulled out my camera and started to tape it.I zoomed in on it and tell me what you think a large retangle shaped vessel with orbs floating through, it looks like small space ships. then it piulled back and changed shape and started traveling se till out of sight.
content.summary: Bright light hovering over the half moon bay mountains changes into a huge craft with orbs

content.detailedDescription: On a country road in richmond in ,we where,my ex girlfriend and myself,she felt this was part of a series of events,we where arguing about whitlet streibers book transformations and she noticed a light travlling off the road to the south,i was driving,so i had to peek and look back at road and at the light,as i looked at light then back at road,...It was that quickly over the moving car.It stayed over us going down the road for some time until i noticed a car approaching in the opposite direction,we then left that area,and drove to another part of the town,she keep insistening that it was still following us, and that she had just saw behind yhe trees,as i went around the bend,i saw the ufo,just sitting there in the sky.I turned sound snd left the area. my ex tells a story more detailed and longer,with more interaction with something..Please this is to me just the tip of the iceberg.
content.summary: Me and my ex where going do road she noticed the light ,then as she told me i noticed the light,then it was on top of the car

content.detailedDescription:
I went to my evening run (20.00 pm) as usual on friday. as i started to run i noticed a strange "star" in the sky. it was hovering to low for a star or satellite , and it was glittering in blue and red. i ignored it and kept on running. i had a strange feeling like something is watching me from that "star". i thought that maybe it's a military baloon , but  i know how these baloons looks like at night , and it wasn't anything i knew. i run for a hour or so and as i turned back and saw again that "star" it moved something like 60 feet from it's original location , so i knew it wasn't a star. when i got back home i took my sony nex6 camera and ascented to my porch. i saw that "star" hovering in the sky. i took some stills photos of the object and one video shot. i had a very strange feeling that night because the moon was full and it shined very brightly almost 90 degrees above me. after 15 minutes i went back home and the object was still in the same place.  
i didn't think about it again since last thursday 11 july 2013. i copied all the pictures in the sd card to my computer. and when i watched the "star" pictures i was very excited because they were very weird. first , in the video i could see another little "star" glittering near the big "star".
then , i saw in the stills photos that the object changed it's shape from round to some kind of lightning like line. and the little "star" also changed it's shape as well. the object changed again and again to a triangle and other stranged shapes. i first assumed that it was a problem with my camera , so i made shots at night from the same point and i didn't get that kind of strange changes in the shapes. when i continued analysing the photos i have noticed that the moon looks like a big odd flashlight with some green orb beside it. and most strange from all - in one of the photos, when i enlarged the "little star" it was in a shape of an alien as we know it from the movies. my wife saw it also and she became very frightened. it looked as if it is floating in the sky. i'm very confused about this sighting , and i don't really know what it was. i would like to share it with the world , and would like experts to see the photos to determine if it's earthly or some kind of an alien being. thank you for your support.
content.summary: A glittering star like object tha changed to multiple shapes. near it was another object that looks like an alien floating in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother saw the object when he arrived home from work last night. 
 it was a very large triangle with white lights at the corners and a single green light in the center. it moved slowly from the north east toward the south west, apparently following a large valley out here in the george washington national forest. 
  he called my sister out side to see the thing and tried to get a picture with his i phone and it wouldn't respond? 
  what's great about this is that prior to him getting home i was out side smoking a cigarette and peeing in the bushes. while standing there i was looking in the woods where the craft would apparently be above later and the words " little green men in the trees " was going through my mind! 
 i am often out side smoking at night and am always looking up, and last night while doing my business, i (whith out a doubt) thought to my self its so over cast i'm not going to bother...  :( .
content.summary: Was large triangular object with thre white lites at the corners and a single green lite in the center. it was verry low and verry large.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a marina. we were out on the terrace enjoying the evening coolness. mostly clear sky with some clouds. quarter moon in the west.
my wife was facing south, looking out into the harbour. i was facing her and looking into the harbour. all of a sudden she shrieked my name and said look up. thankfully she pointed directly up but slightly left. thankfully i looked up over my left shoulder into the sky above. and i saw it as it flew over our roof and flew across the harbour and across lake ontario. it was a huge oval, very brightly lit...Whitelight. for want of a better description the light pattern within the oval looked snowflake like. it was travelling at a great rate of speed. hard to judge, but i would say faster than our fastest jet. as it crossed the lake towards the city of toronto it just vanished. we were stupefied at first. then we looked out at the other terraces. we only saw two other couples having dinner but from their angle and the fact they were in strong conversation it was obvious they missed it. several of the boats were occupied but again people were drinking and conversing and looking down. i saw no sign of commotion. so i had to assume we were the only ones who witnessed the event. unsettling because other people would have added to confirm what we saw. my wife and i quickly went over the facts and we both were in total agreement with what we saw, in terms of height, angle, size, color of lights, rate of speed. we stood out on the terrace for the next half an hour. we stared out at the lights of toronto. which is about 25 miles away as the crow flies. approx distance.
there was a cloudy skyline. twice we saw a huge oval light pop up and seeem to hover and pulsate. it was a mixture of color in terms of light. white and orange. it seemed way too large to be a plane going to or coming from the city airport. i could observe a few planes in the sky during this time in and around toronto and they were small pinpoint white lights that you usually associate with a passenger jet. what the two appearances were i cannot speculate. they appeared for ten seconds and disappeared. perhaps my eyes were playing tricks on me. but the original sighting of the huge oval is definitive to me. i know that was something i was seeing as it was and that it was something i have never seen before. all i can say about the appearance of the two quick hovering light events over toronto within 15 minutes of the incident is that we sit on our terrace all the time at night and look out at toronto and ive never seen those two light events before. so it seems attached to the flying object that i did clearly see. thank you for taking my report.
content.summary: Looked up in the sky and ths huge white light oval-snowflake movnig at a super fast speed flew directly over us and disappeared on the horizon

content.detailedDescription: Me and my 2 brothers were going home after playing some tennis in a small town next to where we live. my brother was driving his car, i was in the passenger seat and my youngest brother was in the rear seat. on the way home approximately 7-8 miles from our small farm i was talking to my brother ( the driver ) and out his window i seen a strange glowing object heading across the field in our direction, i pointed it out to my brother ( the driver ) and told him to pull over, he than seen the ufo and told me no that he wasn't pulling over, but he finally did after a few seconds. once he pulled over he said that he wanted to go ( while observing from the car ) and i said no way i want to see this and grabbed the keys out of the ignition, got out of the car and sat on the hood while to 2 brothers stayed in the car. this is what i saw, it was a glowing circular ( not perfectly round ) noiseless ufo a little higher than treetop level coming right over us from west to east at about 2-3 miles per hour, it was a guess approximately 60 feet in diameter. it was so close that i had to look up at it and couldn't see the top at that point. i do remember that it had a very bright glow that didn't hurt your eyes as i looked at it, but i could not see any spinning or other lights. the thing that was weird i remember the most is that once it got over our car i was looking up at this thing and it seemed to slow down just a little bit more and i remember feeling weird but not scared that this thing new everything about me. sort of like it was observing me. than it crossed over the other side of the street still in a westerly to eastern direction and still moving at approximately 3 miles per hour than disappeared in the blink of an eye leaving no trail. i than got back into to the car gave my brother the keys and he drove home without saying a word, he was the first one to eneter the house and i remember my mom asking me what is wrong with your brother he looks like he just seen a ghost, i than told her what happened. my brother i found out later got so scared about the incident he messed his pants and still to this day will not talk about it unless pushed.
content.summary: Will never forget this event with my brothers.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house in palm bay, florida watching the fireworks on july 4th.  we were talking about ufos, aliens, and life on other planets.  all of the sudden i look over to see a yellowish/reddish orange orb!  i first noticed the object because of it's unusual size, glow, and the way it moved across the sky.  when i first saw the object i had no idea what it was.  i quickly busted out my droid razr phone, and took a video of the orb as it moved from a nw direction to the nw... low and slow...  the object slowly seemed to hover/move silently.  after about 30-40 seconds of viewing, the orb began to radiate a specific blue color.  it wasn't like anything i'd ever seen from common aircraft like planes, helicopters, or whatever else is up there. the closest analogy is like a deep sea jellyfish that radiates it's bio-luminescence colors, except it was wavering mostly blue throughout the orb.  randomly.  my feelings were that this was something of an extraterrestrial nature, but obviously we had just been discussing ufos and aliens so this seemed too coincidental to be true. i'm an avid ufo junky, and i am a firm believer that there are technologies and entities that exist and operate without the public's common knowledge. i walked away from this experience believing i had witnessed, and video recorded a possible ufo or a real ufo of an extraterrestrial nature.  like always, my friends were mostly laughing at me before this experience happened while i ranted on about previous ufos i had witnessed, and several other reasons why i believe a lot of the cases and report to be 100% true. then literally after laughing hysterically at some of my claims we turn our heads to see this beautiful orb moving across the sky.  then it changes colors from the orange/red glow to radiating blue. our minds were officially blown, and i felt relieved that maybe it happened for a reason!  i lost sight of the object as it moved to the nw, and i fiddled around with my camera phone making sure i had gotten a video of the experience.
content.summary: My friends and i were watching fireworks on july 4th when we noticed a yellowish/reddish orange orb move low and slowly accross horizon. then it started pulsating blue!

content.detailedDescription: Russellvileark.July 4,2011. at the corner of 14 & seyquyah,approx.8-9:30pm,i was awaken by what i thought was gun fire,so i got up,went outside and sat on my steps,well i'm looking at the across to the lof,accros from 14 & seyquyah,i see a light go up so i think its kids shooting fireworks,so i keep my phone pointed in that direction,when i continue to see lights blinking,but no fireworks! so i'm calling gods name in hebrew,until i realized that something was going on.With this blinking light! as i follow the light with my phone,some more lights came on,thats when i saw a figure starring at me throug this window,then some four bigger orange lights came on,thats when i had seen enough! after having it but to a dvd,i can clearly hear the ship powering up,and those orange light came out blue on my phone,but when they came on,i couldn't move,and you can hear footsteeps walking up to me,then running off! i turned and headed home and left russellivile.It kept making this sonar whale sound followed  by clicks. help!
content.summary: I snap a picture of one of those beings in the ship befor it took off,please help!

content.detailedDescription: Then noticed aq jet or plane following or chaceing the object it started to close distance suddenly the 1st light went up and pulled away at a even faster speed , suddenly both lights faded away , the aircraft move around the aqrea for a minute then went back to the west slowly.
content.summary: Seen in southern sky 11.00pm, came from w to e 2 spots kinda dim going w to e  just up higher than tall trees  looked up to stars saw 1st light moveing w to e  then saw another light up higher than 1st both moveing fast 1st 1 is ahead of other then notice

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on the deck facing north at approximately 1:30 in the a.M. an approaching glow from just over the trees to the north east of my location caught my eye.  it seemed to come out of nowhere due to the low altitude and treeline in that direction.  i looked up and over the trees from the north & slightly east appeared a red-orange bell shaped object approximately one quarter mile up. it passed me at approximately 300 yards to the east there were no audible sounds from craft. as it passed it was moving at a steady speed with no discernable variation of altitude or speed. naturally i freaked out, (i've seen numerous unidentified objects before but never this close). i ran inside to grab my camera. when i returned outside (about 10 seconds later) i could not locate it. i ran to the east edge of the house, it had travelled further south clearing the field to the south of the house reaching a wooded area.  i watched it slow down and hover momentarily. it looked to be hovering at the top of the trees across the field. i watched it change from its red orange color to a dark goldish yellow color as it descended. it disappeared from my line of sight behind the trees approximately 1/2 mile away. i attempted to take pictures of the hover & descent but it was too dark and i didn't have the camera settings ready for night pics and video. there were no usable pictures or video. it did appear however that the area the object should of occupied was "washed out" while the rest of the exposure appeared normal. i believe this was caused by the object. after i lost sight of the object i returned inside quite shaken up.  i opened up the blinds in the windows facing south. i did some dishes so i could look out the window and to take my mind off what i had seen and occupy some time while waiting to hopefully see this again. i had the windows open so i could listen for anything out of the ordinary. i heard some unusual noises from outside, i was already on edge so i then closed all the windows & blinds in the house. a few more minutes passed and i had a feeling that i should look out the window just then. i pulled back the blind, (there are railroad tracks about 25 feet from the backside of the house that are elevated blocking visibility) i looked in the previous direction & saw nothing,  i opened the blind fully, just then a huge!  crescent/cross shaped craft with a greenish aura around it & 4 or 5 red lights on the underside ascended from behind the railroad tracks. it flew directly over the top of the house, i ran out the front door to see it ascend at 45deg quickly and entirely silent. there were no obvious signs of propulsion. i attempted to take pics with my iphone of the ascent those did not come out either. have not seen bell shaped object again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched bell watched shaped red-orange object fly over east field then hovered above trees
